about_the_game:
You're hiring more and more people for your small company!

But that's not all – you need to fit everyone into their workspace. And as if their various shapes and sizes weren't enough, they also come with special requests!

Take George, for example: he always wants to be next to the coffee machine.

Or Gwen and Grace, who are inseparable – don’t even think about placing one at one end of the room and the other at the opposite side!

In short, you get the idea. Cosy Company Puzzle is an intense puzzle game! But in the end, everyone feels much better.

Key Features

  • Handcrafted Levels
    80 handcrafted levels, some of which might seriously challenge your brain.

  • Simple Controls
    Everything is mouse-based: left-click to move, right-click to rotate. Nothing to get in the way of your brainpower! (And it works with touchscreens too!)

  • Relaxing Lo-fi Music
    Plenty of tracks to soothe your ears and immerse you in a calm, reflective atmosphere.

  • A Wholesome Environment
    The corporate world is often synonymous with stress and productivity. But here, we take our time, listen to everyone, and embrace everyone's unique needs.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (or Higler)
  • Processor: Dual-core from Intel or AMD at 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Videocard with at least 512MB
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: In this colorful 2D puzzle game, you have to take care of the employees of your small company by placing them on the grid according to shapes, but also according to their specific criteria. The story of Cosy Company Puzzle unfolds as you work your way through 80 hand-crafted levels.
